I also need two Pillars/columns that match the style of the tower which will go on either side of the ipad screen in the overlay (one asset is necessary as I can just duplicate it). I plan to have some sort of waterfall come out of these towers so a water spout at the top would be nice (i can do the water part myself in post processing). the columns will need to be pretty tall (spanning the entire length of the screen in a standard full-screen 1920x1080 video). desc: I need someone who has experience with applying apex cloth inside of UE4 to material LOD. Ive been using blender and nvidia clothing tool profile but the resulting .apx file makes the engine crash when applying it to the material LOD 0. I tried to search internet for a solution... Maybe using the maya plugin or 3ds would not result in a crash but i dont have those so I can't try it on my own.I am open to other plugins and/or methods to create realisitc cloth as long as the cloth moves with the character and doesnt clip into it when I go to animate. I already have everything modeled and rigged.
title: Urgent need for someone who has used Apex cloth in UE4 to make my cloth realistic.

The person gets more sick, blood pressure rises we see some medical devices and hospital things as the person gets sicker. We see the Infection spread through starting from the device. Person dies.Next part shows a breakdown of the new device and how it can solve this problem.I would like the video to have voice over and text pop up, but I believe I can do the graphics,text and voice. I would like someone to just animate the story and show the devices.
